Instance.description: A very basic non-user facing complex situation that runs an aggregate filter to get the Sims that should be used in it and then has a single situation state.

TunableTuple.name: go_to_sport_slope_state
TunableTuple.description: State for WalkbyTandemSleddingSituation where the sledding sims go to the sport slope.

TunableTuple.name: interaction_of_interest
TunableTuple.description: The interaction that when run will cause GPE defined behavior to run.

TunableList.name: affordances
TunableList.description: The Sim must have started either any affordance in this list or an interaction matching one of the tags in this tunable's Tags field.

TunableList.name: tags
TunableList.description: The Sim must have run either an interaction matching one of these Tags or an affordance from the list of Affordances in this tunable.

TunableList.name: job_and_role_changes
TunableList.description: A mapping between situation jobs and role states that defines what role states we want to switch to for sims on which jobs when this situation state is entered.

Tunable.name: Role State
Tunable.description: The role state that we will switch sims of the linked job into.

Tunable.name: Situation Job
Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that we will use to change sim's role state.

Tunable.name: group_filter
Tunable.description: The aggregate filter that we use to find the sims for this situation.

TunableList.name: sim_spawner_tags
TunableList.description: A list of tags that represent where to spawn Sims for this Situation when they come onto the lot. This tuning will be used instead of the tuning on the jobs. NOTE: Tags will be searched in order of tuning. Tag [0] has priority over Tag [1] and so on.

TunableList.name: situation_job_mapping
TunableList.description:
A mapping of filter term tag to situation job.
The filter term tag is returned as part of the sim filters used to create the guest list for this particular situation.
The situation job is the job that the Sim will be assigned to in the background situation.

TunableEnum.name: filter_tag
TunableEnum.description: The filter term tag returned with the filter results.

Tunable.name: job
Tunable.description: The job the Sim will receive when added to the this situation.

Tunable.name: initial_role_state
Tunable.description: The initial Role State of the sled leader.

Tunable.name: situation_job
Tunable.description: The Situation Job of the sled leader.

Tunable.name: initial_role_state
Tunable.description: The initial Role State of the passenger.

Tunable.name: situation_job
Tunable.description: The Situation Job of the passenger.

TunableTuple.name: sled_state
TunableTuple.description: State for WalkbyTandemSleddingSituation where the sims actually sled

TunableTuple.name: interaction_of_interest
TunableTuple.description: The interaction that when run will cause GPE defined behavior to run.

TunableList.name: affordances
TunableList.description: The Sim must have started either any affordance in this list or an interaction matching one of the tags in this tunable's Tags field.

TunableList.name: tags
TunableList.description: The Sim must have run either an interaction matching one of these Tags or an affordance from the list of Affordances in this tunable.

TunableList.name: job_and_role_changes
TunableList.description: A mapping between situation jobs and role states that defines what role states we want to switch to for sims on which jobs when this situation state is entered.

Tunable.name: Role State
Tunable.description: The role state that we will switch sims of the linked job into.

Tunable.name: Situation Job
Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that we will use to change sim's role state.
